resources.string:
Swipe down twice from the top of your screen to open all Quick Settings.
 Tap the ✎ (Edit) icon or “Edit tiles”.
 Find the “No Glasses” tile and drag it up to the active area.
 The tile will now appear in your Quick Settings panel.

No Glasses adds a button in your phone’s pull-down panel to quickly switch between normal and large text.
\n\nYou can click it when you need things bigger, for example you don\'t have your glasses.

No Glasses lets you toggle between your normal text size and a larger one, via a Quick Settings tile.


It is free, ad-free, and open source. No data is shared with us, advertisers, or any third parties—only the usual information with Google.


Project page: https://app-muon.github.io/noglassesmode 

Email: muonappdevelopment@gmail.com
Then you are all set! You can now use the “No Glasses” button from your pull-down menu.
